english.segment1: - verse 1 -. Im all alone, longing to see you. Cause this airport gray has got me blue. I want to go home. Cause these West Texas plains are far too plain a view. Compared to you.
english.segment2: - chorus -. Youd be a sight for my sore eyes.
english.segment3: - verse 2 -. Im all alone, longing to see you smile. But my heart knows as time slows, itll be a while. I watch the clock, and the minutes feel like days. So if my watch is right, then my flights still months away.
english.segment5: - bridge -. And theres an aching in my eyes, because they need to feel your gaze. They just dont realize its only been four days
